title: The Power of Community in Times of Chaos
description:
Jillian’s personal experience with a close friend has left her at a loss as to how to support someone going through addiction and recovery. So this week, we have Lemonada Media co-founder/host of the podcast Last Day, Stephanie Wittels Wachs, on the show to talk about the importance of connecting to others.

Guest links:

LemonadaMedia.com

Subscribe or listen to Last Day: http://smarturl.it/lastdaypodcast 


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
